      • convertEdgeMessagetoEdgeElement

        public java.lang.String convertEdgeMessagetoEdgeElement(org.edge.protocol.opcua.api.common.EdgeMessage msg)
        Convert String from EdgeMessage format to EdgeElement format
        Use EdgeCommandType to find operation
        Use EdgeElement to convert format
        Use EdgeAttribute to convert format
        Use EdgeJsonFormatter.encodeEdgeElementToJsonString(EdgeElement) to encode EdgeElement to JsonString
        Use getResponseElementForSubscription(EdgeMessage) get response subscription data
        Parameters:
        msg - response message data format is EdgeMessage
        Returns:
        EdgeElement format string if operation is included in EdgeCommandType, otherwise null

      • convertEdgeDevicetoEdgeElement

        public java.lang.String convertEdgeDevicetoEdgeElement(org.edge.protocol.opcua.api.common.EdgeDevice device)
        Convert String from EdgeDevice format to EdgeElement format
        Use getResponseElementForEndpoint(EdgeDevice) get response subscription data
        Parameters:
        device - response message data format is EdgeDevice
        Returns:
        String format based EdgeElement if EdgeDevice is not null, otherwise null

      • convertEdgeElementToEdgeMessage

        public org.edge.protocol.opcua.api.common.EdgeMessage convertEdgeElementToEdgeMessage(org.command.json.format.EdgeElement element,
                                                                                      java.lang.String operation,
                                                                                      java.lang.String providerKey,
                                                                                      org.edgexfoundry.domain.meta.Addressable addr,
                                                                                      java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.String> future)
                                                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Convert command message from EdgeElement format to EdgeMessage format
        Use getStartMessage(EdgeElement, String, Addressable, CompletableFuture) to convert format
        Use getStopMessage(EdgeElement, String, Addressable, CompletableFuture) to convert format
        Use getReadMessage(EdgeElement, String, Addressable, CompletableFuture) to convert format
        Use getWriteMessage(EdgeElement, String, Addressable, CompletableFuture) to convert format
        Use getSubMessage(EdgeElement, String, Addressable, CompletableFuture) to convert format
        Use getMethodMessage(EdgeElement, String, Addressable, CompletableFuture) to convert format
        Use getEndpointMessage(EdgeElement, String, Addressable, CompletableFuture) to convert format
        Parameters:
        element - element object of json format
        operation - opcua command
        providerKey - provider key which node
        addr - addressable object
        future - CompletableFuture object
        Returns:
        command message format is EdgeMessage
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if convert fail

      • sendMessage

        public org.edge.protocol.opcua.api.common.EdgeResult sendMessage(org.edge.protocol.opcua.api.common.EdgeMessage msg)
                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Send command message and get response
        Use ProtocolManager.send(EdgeMessage) to send message
        Parameters:
        msg - command message
        Returns:
        response message format is EdgeResult
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if it is fail to send and receive message

        Use Addressable to generate endpoint URI
        Parameters:
